name: suprunov/qunique
description: A powerful job queue management framework for PHP and Redis

suggest.ext-phpiredis: Allows faster serialization and deserialization of the Redis protocol
suggest.ext-curl: Allows access to Webdis when paired with phpiredis
suggest.ext-pdo: Required to use the database queue worker.
suggest.ext-filter: Required to use the SQS queue worker.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Required to use the database failed job providers.
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk queue driver (^5.0).
